Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 63rd. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 63rd.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute near Kedzie/Jackson
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses temp. rerouted NB: Kedzie, Congress, Homan, Madison and Kedzie; SB: Kedzie, Madison, Homan, Harrison and Kedzie near Kedzie/Jackson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Kedzie/Jackson due to street blockage near Kedzie/Jackson.

Northbound buses will operate via Kedzie, Congress, Homan, Madison and Kedzie.

Southbound buses will operate via Kedzie, Madison, Homan, Harrison and Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.
